content.body: I mean if we'd just made Promises monadic in the first place, we wouldn't be in this situation.
* I mean if we'd just made Promises monadic in the first place, we wouldn't be in this situation...

m.new_content.body: I mean if we'd just made Promises monadic in the first place, we wouldn't be in this situation...

content.body: I do like that there's a proof of concept here about how we can already do this. That's great to hear. I'd actually be OK with this proposal evolving into "NewbornSafeResolve" -- as I said in the proposal  repo, I'm of the opinion we don't need to fix _every_ problem, but if we can at least make progress on improving the state of the world I'd be happy.
content.formatted_body: I do like that there's a proof of concept here about how we can already do this. That's great to hear. I'd actually be OK with this proposal evolving into "NewbornSafeResolve" -- as I said in the proposal repo, I'm of the opinion we don't need to fix every problem, but if we can at least make progress on improving the state of the world I'd be happy.
